pkgmetadata.longdescription: # JobQueuesUnified interface for submitting jobs to various queueing systems.## InstallTo get the latest PyPI release use:```shpip install jobqueues```Or if you want the latest github version:```shpip install git+https://github.com/acellera/jobqueues```or clone the git and install manually with```shgit clone https://github.com/acellera/jobqueuescd jobqueuespip install .```
